tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_readings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR,
    type VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_metadata (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metadata_key VARCHAR,
    metadata_value VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_aggregates (
    aggregate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    end_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    average_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT REFERENCES sensor_data(sensor_id),
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
);
